summary:
- **Performance Rights Issuance**: 10,000,000 unquoted performance rights (TKMAG) issued on 07/07/2025.  
- **Recipients**:  
  - 5,000,000 to Tony Leibowitz (via Kalonda Pty Ltd)  
  - 3,000,000 to Neil Biddle (via Biddle Partners Pty Ltd)  
  - 2,000,000 to John Young (via family trust).  
- **Purpose**: Approved at AGM (04/07/2025) under employee incentive scheme (terms linked: [trekmetals.com.au](https://trekmetals.com.au/announcements/6993046)).  
- **Post-issue Capital Structure**:  
  - Quoted: 596,527,915 TKM CDIs; 41,666,618 TKMO options.  
  - Unquoted: 46,770,000 TKMAG performance rights.  

*No material trading or capital markets impact identified (routine director incentive issuance).*
